fields.name: Best Arena Heroes
fields.value:
The best offensive heroes are *Aly*, *Arthur*, *Chione*, *Selene*, and *Seondeok*.
The best defensive heroes are *Aly*, *Arthur*, *Chione*, *Selene*, and *Zeus*.

fields.name: Best Starter Heroes
fields.value: Even at low level, *Chione* and *Seondeok* are useful in arena.

fields.name: Best All-Rounder
fields.value: A high-level *Aly* is very useful in Arena, Honor Hunting, and Hero Trial.

fields.name: Best Leveling Heroes
fields.value: *Hohenheim*, *Davison*, and *Seondeok* are the best heroes for leveling.
